channel.title: Invisible PM's from Donators
channel.description:
Hey guys, lately I have been noticing that all the PM's from my donators on my server are invisible.
Here is a little something of what I mean -
http://prntscr.com/76e2b
I know that I can probably just remove the donator symbol and it would work, but I there is another way.
If any of you know please help me out, thanks.
